ingredients.ingredient: 4 green bell peppers, seeded and chopped
2 red bell peppers, seeded and chopped
2 green chile peppers, seeded and chopped

cookingTips: Blend ingredients until smooth for restaurant-quality sofrito consistency
Store in ice cube trays for easy portioning and freezing
Use within a week or freeze for up to 3 months for best flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me make fresh Puerto Rican sofrito with properly balanced peppers, onions, and garlic
